name: Fupacabra
description:
Have you ever craved a spicy chicken sandwich? Well, the fupacabra has - and won't stop at anything to get one (even if that means nibbling on you). 

Deep in Gattineau national park where many people like to picnic lives the legend of the fupacabra - a once normal, middle-aged woman who, after going too long without her favorite chicken sandwiches, morphed in to a ravenous, hideous being with a rather large fupa. 

It's up to you to explore the wooded park to find the 5 ingredients necessary to make the tastiest chicken sandwich Gattineau has ever seen, before heading to the central BBQ area to assemble the burger. But be warned - the fupacabra is hungry. Every time you pick up an ingredient the fupacabra will sense your location. Sometimes as you wonder the forest, you may experience a "fupaflash" - meaning that the beast has also sensed your location. 

If she sees you, she'll chase you - but don't fret, sprint away and after a while, the fupacabra will lose interest. Get too close however... and you'll be eating fupa for a week. 

So tread carefully, and most importantly - feed the fupacabra! 

Controls : WASD and shift to sprint.
